data.message: Can you stop the large fonts for short posts?  I won't post with that.

replies.message: Hello Robert. To highlight posts that contain only text, some Facebook posts may appear larger in News Feed. Unfortunately, you can't edit the text size of these posts. -Jon

Facebook I start to write a post, and it's very large - until you get several spaces out - then it shrinks to a normal size.  Anything less than that ends up being very large.  I am unaware if there is a setting I can adjust - but I don't believe so.  Thank You for your response.
Hi Robert. To highlight posts that contain only text, some Facebook posts may appear larger in News Feed. You can't edit the text size of these posts. Learn more: http://bit.ly/2jHzfTH. -Jessica
Facebook large fonts should not be forced upon my posts.  To return to normal size, one needs to have no less than 86 spaces.  Anything less remains large.
